markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 344 4.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Spell Lists** [Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5) **Deities** [Besmara](/Deities.aspx?ID=32), [Dagon](/Deities.aspx?ID=75), [Hanspur](/Deities.aspx?ID=154), [Lysianassa](/Deities.aspx?ID=105), [Ragadahn](/Deities.aspx?ID=99), [Sobek](/Deities.aspx?ID=60) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 60 feet **Target** 1 creature or unattended object --- You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. Make a ranged spell attack roll. **Critical Success** The target takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet.
**Success** The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet. --- **Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Hydraulic Push
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 344 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

[Besmara](/Deities.aspx?ID=32), [Dagon](/Deities.aspx?ID=75), [Hanspur](/Deities.aspx?ID=154), [Lysianassa](/Deities.aspx?ID=105), [Ragadahn](/Deities.aspx?ID=99), [Sobek](/Deities.aspx?ID=60)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

 

**Target** 1 creature or unattended object
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Damage and push a creature with a blast of water.
</summary>
summary: Damage and push a creature with a blast of water.
summary_markdown: Damage and push a creature with a blast of water.
text: Hydraulic Push Source Core Rulebook pg. 344 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deities Besmara, Dagon, Hanspur, Lysianassa, Ragadahn, Sobek Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 60 feet Target 1 creature or unattended object --- You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. Make a ranged spell attack roll. Critical Success The target takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet. Success The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
